thread.section_title: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: catinas2017
title: Good location
text:
Double Tree Suites is located right next to the subway and centrally located to the theatres and shopping area. The price is very reasonable especially you visit there with a family. Our room is a suite with a sizable sitting area and bedroom. The size of the room in this area is comparably good size (as we stayed three hotels before.) The three seater sofa is reasonably big and soft. We are big fans of musicals, the theatre of Sunset Boulevard is just down stair. It is just a five mins walk to Rockefeller and 5th Ave. It is very appreciated that during our stay as my daughter was very sick, the cleaner helped us to do the cleaning twice a day and the receptionist helped us to call for a doctor in a minute.
Room Tip: Corner room See more room tips
